column17:
Product Description

A gentle facial cleanser with a stable form of Vitamin C to be used daily to help achieve beautiful healthy looking skin. Take your cleansing routine to a whole new dimension with Radiant CTM Daily Facial Scrub Cleanser. This delightful citrus-scented mildly foaming cleanser contains jojoba/beeswax beads to lift away dirt and debris as well as extracts of Orange Lime Grapefruit and Lemon Peel Oil to help soften and smooth the skin. Suitable for all skin types this product features useful antioxidant protection to help keep your skin looking and feeling healthy. Healthy Skin is Radiant Skin!
